issues.description: Agent capabilities endpoint not responding correctly
Invalid DOM nesting: div elements inside p elements
issues.stepsToReproduce: Inspect dashboard.tsx for div inside p tags, particularly in Skeleton components
issues.observedOutput: DOM nesting warning in browser console
issues.expectedOutput: Valid HTML structure with proper element nesting

issues.description: Agent Bridge disabled due to missing SHARED_SECRET
issues.stepsToReproduce: Start application without SHARED_SECRET environment variable
issues.observedOutput: Agent Bridge disabled message in logs
issues.expectedOutput: Graceful degradation (this is actually correct behavior)
